Generative Model and Discriminative Model
Generative network
◦ Generates sample data
◦ Input: Gaussian white noise vector z
◦ Output: sample data vector x
( ; )Gx G z 
z x

 Discriminator network
 Determines whether sample data is 
real
 Input: real sample data 𝑥𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑙 and
generated sample data 𝑥=𝐺 𝑧
 Output: probability that determines 
whether the sample is real
